title: Design Parking Lot System
description: Design a parking lot system that can handle multiple floors, different vehicle types (car, bike, truck), and track available spots. Include entry/exit management and payment calculation.
hints: Classes: ParkingLot, Floor, ParkingSpot, Vehicle, Ticket
Use Factory pattern for different vehicle types
Strategy pattern for pricing based on vehicle type and duration
Consider concurrency for multiple entry/exit points
spaceComplexity: O(n) where n is number of spots

title: Design Library Management System
description: Design a library management system with book catalog, member management, issue/return books, fine calculation, and book reservation features.
hints: Classes: Library, Book, Member, Librarian, Transaction, Fine
Use Singleton for Library instance
Observer pattern for notifications (due dates, availability)
Handle multiple copies of same book

title: Design ATM Machine
description: Design an ATM system with authentication, balance inquiry, cash withdrawal, deposit, and transaction history features.
hints: Classes: ATM, Card, Account, Transaction, CashDispenser
Use State pattern for ATM states (Idle, CardInserted, PIN verification)
Strategy pattern for different transaction types
Handle edge cases: insufficient funds, invalid PIN

title: Design Elevator System
description: Design an elevator control system for a building with multiple elevators. Implement efficient scheduling algorithm.
hints: Classes: Building, Elevator, Request, Scheduler, Direction
Use Strategy pattern for different scheduling algorithms (FCFS, SCAN, LOOK)
State pattern for elevator states (Moving, Idle, Maintenance)
Consider optimization: minimize wait time, energy consumption

title: Design Chat Application
description: Design a real-time chat application supporting one-on-one and group chats, message delivery status, and user presence.
hints: Classes: User, Chat, Message, Group, MessageQueue
Observer pattern for real-time updates
Use WebSocket for bidirectional communication
Consider message persistence and delivery guarantees
timeComplexity: O(1) for send, O(n) for group messages

title: Design Food Delivery System
description: Design a food delivery platform like Swiggy/Zomato with restaurant management, order placement, delivery tracking, and payment.
hints: Classes: Restaurant, Customer, Order, DeliveryAgent, Menu, Payment
Strategy pattern for delivery assignment algorithms
State pattern for order status (Placed, Preparing, Out for Delivery, Delivered)
Consider rating system and search functionality

title: Design Movie Booking System
description: Design a movie ticket booking system like BookMyShow with theater management, seat selection, and booking confirmation.
hints: Classes: Movie, Theater, Show, Seat, Booking, Payment
Handle concurrent booking with locking mechanism
Use State pattern for seat status (Available, Locked, Booked)
Implement seat hold timeout mechanism
timeComplexity: O(1) for booking, O(n) for search

title: Design Online Shopping Cart
description: Design an e-commerce shopping cart system with product catalog, cart management, checkout, and order processing.
hints: Classes: Product, Cart, Order, User, Payment, Inventory
Strategy pattern for pricing strategies (discounts, coupons)
Observer pattern for inventory updates
Consider cart persistence and session management

title: Design Social Media Platform
description: Design a social media platform with user profiles, posts, comments, likes, follow/unfollow, and news feed generation.
hints: Classes: User, Post, Comment, Like, Friendship, NewsFeed
Use Observer pattern for feed updates
Consider privacy settings (public, friends, private)
Implement efficient feed generation algorithm

title: Design File System
description: Design an in-memory file system with support for creating files/directories, reading/writing content, and path navigation.
hints: Classes: FileSystem, File, Directory, Node
Use Composite pattern for files and directories
Implement tree structure for hierarchy
Support operations: ls, mkdir, addContent, readContent

title: Design URL Shortener
description: Design a URL shortening service like bit.ly with custom aliases, analytics, and expiration.
hints: Classes: URLService, URL, Analytics, Database
Use base62 encoding for short URLs
Handle collisions with counter or random generation
Track analytics: clicks, referrers, timestamps
spaceComplexity: O(n) where n is number of URLs

title: Design Rate Limiter
description: Design a rate limiter to control the rate of requests sent or received by a system.
hints: Algorithms: Token Bucket, Leaky Bucket, Fixed Window, Sliding Window
Classes: RateLimiter, TokenBucket, RequestCounter
Use Redis or in-memory cache for distributed systems
Consider time-based expiration

title: Design Notification System
description: Design a notification service that supports multiple channels (email, SMS, push) with retry logic and templates.
hints: Classes: NotificationService, Channel, Template, Queue, Retry
Strategy pattern for different notification channels
Use message queue for async processing
Implement exponential backoff for retries

title: Design Snake and Ladder Game
description: Design a snake and ladder board game with multiple players, dice rolling, and win conditions.
hints: Classes: Game, Board, Player, Dice, Snake, Ladder
Use HashMap to store snake and ladder positions
Implement turn-based gameplay
Handle edge cases: multiple players on same cell, winning condition

title: Design Logging Framework
description: Design a logging framework with different log levels, multiple outputs (file, console), and log rotation.
hints: Classes: Logger, LogLevel, Appender, Formatter, Filter
Singleton pattern for Logger instance
Strategy pattern for different appenders (file, console, database)
Chain of Responsibility for log level filtering

title: Design Vending Machine
description: Design a vending machine with product selection, payment processing, change return, and inventory management.
hints: Classes: VendingMachine, Product, Inventory, Coin, State
State pattern for machine states (Idle, SelectProduct, Payment, Dispense)
Handle insufficient balance, sold out items
Calculate change with minimum coins

title: Design Hotel Booking System
description: Design a hotel reservation system with room availability, booking, cancellation, and pricing based on occupancy.
hints: Classes: Hotel, Room, Booking, Customer, Payment, Availability
Handle date range queries efficiently
Strategy pattern for pricing (seasonal, occupancy-based)
Consider overbooking and cancellation policies

title: Design Chess Game
description: Design a chess game with all piece movements, check/checkmate detection, and game state management.
hints: Classes: Game, Board, Piece, Player, Move, Position
Use Strategy pattern for different piece movements
Implement move validation for each piece type
Handle special moves: castling, en passant, pawn promotion
